rg.name: Bryan Trude
rg.affiliation: University of Georgia | UGA, University of Georgia, Department of Advertising and Public Relations

works.title: “You are a disgrace and traitor to our country”: Uncivil rhetoric against the ‘squad’ on Twitter.
abstract:
Purpose
For many, the sole source for news content is social media, where passionate opinions are posted at an alarming speed. These opinions can cross the line from differing opinions shared in a public forum onto uncivil dialogue and even hate speech. Such online discourse threatens democratic values and creates a hostile environment. The purpose...
